info.title: TraDE Middleware API
info.description: This is the API of the TraDE middleware.

get.description:
Gets all available `DataDependencyGraph` resources.
Optional query parameter of **start** and **size** enable pagination of the collection of data dependency graph resources and param **targetNamespace**, **name** and **entity** filter result list by name, targetNamespace and entity.

parameters.name: targetNamespace
parameters.description: Target namespace of data dependency graph to return

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of data dependency graph to return

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: Creating entity of data dependency graph to return

200.description: Returns all `DataDependencyGraph` resources based on the provided parameters.

post.summary: Creates and adds a new data dependency graph to the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: dataDependencyGraphData
parameters.description: The name and creating entity of the data dependency graph that will be created.

201.description: Successfully created and added a new data dependency graph

get.summary: Find a data dependency graph by Id

parameters.name: graphId
parameters.description: Id of the data dependency graph that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `DataDependencyGraph` resource based on the provided parameters.

delete.description: Deletes a data dependency graph from the TraDE middleware.

parameters.name: graphId
parameters.description: Id of the data dependency graph that needs to be fetched

get.summary: Provides the serialized graph model of the data dependency graph

parameters.name: graphId
parameters.description: Id of the data dependency graph that needs to be fetched

200.description: The serialized graph model

post.summary: Upload a serialized graph model to the TraDE middleware in order to make it available.

parameters.name: graphId
parameters.description: Id of the data dependency graph that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: Content-Length
parameters.description: The size of the serialized graph model passed as header

parameters.name: graph
parameters.description: The serialized graph model to upload.

204.description: Successfully uploaded the graph model to the TraDE middleware.

get.summary: Get the data model associated to the data dependency graph.

parameters.name: graphId
parameters.description: Id of the data dependency graph that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns the `DataModel` resource associated to the data dependency graph.

post.summary: Associates an existing dataModel to the data dependency graph.

parameters.name: graphId
parameters.description: Id of the data dependency graph that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataModelId
parameters.description: The id of a data model that should be associated to this data dependency graph.

get.description:
Gets all available `DataModel` resources.
Optional query parameter of **start** and **size** enable pagination of the collection of data model resources and param **targetNamespace**, **name** and **entity** filter result list by name, targetNamespace and entity.

parameters.name: targetNamespace
parameters.description: Target namespace of data model to return

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of data model to return

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: Creating entity of data dependency graph to return

200.description: Returns all `DataModel` resources based on the provided parameters.

post.summary: Creates and adds a new data model to the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: dataModelData
parameters.description: The name and creating entity of the data model that will be created.

201.description: Successfully created and added a new data model

get.summary: Find a data model by Id

parameters.name: dataModelId
parameters.description: Id of the data model that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `DataModel` resource based on the provided parameters.

delete.summary: Deletes a data model and all related resources.
delete.description: Deletes a data model and all resources related to it from the TraDE middleware. This means that all data objects and their data elements defined through this data model as well as their instances will be deleted. Therefore, the deletion of a data model should be handled with care since it is one of the core artifacts used by the TraDE middleware.

parameters.name: dataModelId
parameters.description: Id of the data model that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataModelId
parameters.description: Id of the data model that needs to be fetched

200.description: The serialized data model

post.summary: Upload a serialized data model to the TraDE middleware in order to make it available.

parameters.name: dataModelId
parameters.description: Id of the data model that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: Content-Length
parameters.description: The size of the serialized data model passed as header

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The serialized data model to upload.

204.description: Successfully uploaded the data model to the TraDE middleware.

get.description:
Gets all `DataObject` resources which belong the data model.
Optional query parameter of **start** and **size** enable pagination of the collection of data object resources.

parameters.name: dataModelId
parameters.description: Id of the data model that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns all `DataObject` resources which belong the given data model.

get.description:
Gets all available `DataObject` resources.
Optional query parameter of **start** and **size** enable pagination of the collection of data object resources, params **name** and **entity** filter result list by name and entity and param **status** filters result list by status of the data objects.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of data objects to return

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: Creating entity of data dependency graph to return

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of data objects to return

200.description: Returns all `DataObject` resources based on the provided parameters.

post.summary: Creates and adds a new data object to the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: dataObjectData
parameters.description: The name and creating entity of the data object that will be created.

201.description: Successfully created and added a new data object

get.summary: Find a data object by Id

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `DataObject` resource based on the provided parameters.

put.summary: Update an existing dataObject. If the dataObject belongs to a dataModel the update request will be rejected, since data models are immutable resources.

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be updated

parameters.name: dataObject
parameters.description: The updated data object resource. Only changes to the following fields are reflected **name** and creating **entity**. All other changes are ignored since the corresponding fields of the resource are internally set by the server or are immutable.

200.description: Returns the updated `DataObject` resource based on the provided modifications.

delete.summary: Deletes a dataObject. If the dataObject belongs to a dataModel the delete request will be rejected, since data models are immutable resources.
delete.description: Deletes a complete data object and its referenced data elements as well as all instances of conntected to both the data object and its data elements from the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be fetched

204.description: Data object and all associated resource are deleted successfully.

get.description:
Gets all available `DataObjectInstance` resources.
Optional query parameter of **start** and **size** enable pagination of the collection of data object instance resources and param **status** filters result list by status of the data object instances.

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of data object instances to return

200.description: Returns all `DataObjectInstance` resources based on the provided parameters.

post.summary: Creates a data object instance for the specified dataObject. In addition a corresponding data element instance for all data elements of the specified dataObject are created.

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataObjectInstanceData
parameters.description: The creating entity and correlation properties of the data object instance that will be created.

201.description: Successfully created and added a new data object instance

get.description:
Gets all available `DataElement` resources.
Optional query parameter of **start** and **size** enable pagination of the collection of data element resources, param **name** filters result list by name and param **status** filters result list by status of the data elements.

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of data elements to return

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of data elements to return

200.description: Returns all `DataElement` resources based on the provided parameters.

post.summary: Add a new dataElement to the dataObject. If the dataObject belongs to a dataModel the create request will be rejected, since data models are immutable resources.

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataElementData
parameters.description: The name and creating entity of the data element that will be created.

201.description: Successfully created and added a new data element

post.description:
Query an available `DataObjectInstance` resource based on specified parameters.
Query parameters **dataModelName** and **dataObjectName** as well as **correlationProperties** transfered as request body are used as a query to find a matching data object instance.

parameters.name: dataModelNamespace
parameters.description: Namespace of the data model a data object instance should belong to.

parameters.name: dataModelName
parameters.description: Name of the data model a data object instance should belong to.

parameters.name: dataObjectName
parameters.description: The name of the data object the instance should belong to.

parameters.name: correlationProperties
parameters.description: An array of correlation properties associated with the searched data object instance.

200.description: Returns a `DataObjectInstance` resource based on the provided parameters.

get.summary: Find a data object instance by Id

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: Id of the data object instance that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `DataObjectInstance` resource based on the provided parameters.

delete.description: Deletes a complete data object instance and its referenced data element instances from the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: Id of the data object instance that needs to be fetched

get.description:
Gets all available `DataElementInstance` resources.
Optional query parameter of **start** and **size** enable pagination of the collection of data element instance resources and param **status** filters result list by status of the data element instances.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: Id of the data object instance that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of data element instances to return

200.description: Returns all `DataElementInstance` resources based on the provided parameters.

get.summary: Get a data element instance from a data object instance by the name of the corresponding data element

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: Id of the data object instance that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataElementName
parameters.description: The name of the data element for which we want to get the instance from the current data object instance

200.description: Returns a `DataElementInstance` resource based on the provided parameters.

get.description:
Gets all available `DataElement` resources.
Optional query parameter of **start** and **size** enable pagination of the collection of data element resources, param **name** filters result list by name and param **status** filters result list by status of the data elements.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of data elements to return

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of data elements to return

200.description: Returns all `DataElement` resources based on the provided parameters.

get.summary: Find a data element by Id

parameters.name: dataElementId
parameters.description: Id of the data element that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `DataElement` resource based on the provided parameters.

put.summary: Update an existing data element. If the parent dataObject belongs to a dataModel the update request will be rejected, since data models are immutable resources.

parameters.name: dataElementId
parameters.description: Id of the data element that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataElement
parameters.description: The updated data element resource. Only changes to the following fields are reflected **name**, **type** and **contentType**. All other changes are ignored since the corresponding fields of the resource are internally set by the server or are immutable.

200.description: Returns the updated `DataElement` resource based on the provided modifications.

delete.summary: Deletes a data element. If the parent dataObject belongs to a dataModel the update request will be rejected, since data models are immutable resources.
delete.description: Deletes a complete data element and its referenced instances from the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: dataElementId
parameters.description: Id of the data element that needs to be deleted

get.description:
Gets all available `DataElementInstance` resources.
Optional query parameter of **start** and **size** enable pagination of the collection of data element instance resources and param **status** filters result list by status of the data element instances.

parameters.name: dataElementId
parameters.description: Id of the data element that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of data element instances to return

200.description: Returns all `DataElementInstance` resources based on the provided parameters.

post.description:
Query an available `DataElementInstance` resource based on specified parameters.
Query parameters **dataModelName**, **dataObjectName** and **dataElementName** as well as **correlationProperties** transfered as request body are used as a query to find a matching data element instance.

parameters.name: dataModelNamespace
parameters.description: Namespace of the data model a data object instance should belong to.

parameters.name: dataModelName
parameters.description: Name of the data model a data element instance should belong to.

parameters.name: dataObjectName
parameters.description: The name of the data object the instance should belong to.

parameters.name: dataElementName
parameters.description: The name of the data element the instance should belong to.

parameters.name: correlationProperties
parameters.description: An array of correlation properties associated with the searched data element instance.

200.description: Returns a `DataElementInstance` resource based on the provided parameters.

get.summary: Find a data element instance by Id

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: Id of the data element instance that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `DataElementInstance` resource based on the provided parameters.

get.summary: Get the data value associated to the data element instance.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: Id of the data element instance that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns the `DataValue` resource associated to the data element instance.

post.summary: Creates a new or associates an existing dataValue to the data element instance.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: Id of the data element instance that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataValueData
parameters.description: DataValue object that needs to be created or associated. In case of updating the associated data value providing the Id is enough. To create and associate a new DataValue, a name, type and who created the data value are required. The specification of a contentType is only required if the data type of the data value is binary.

200.description: Successfully associated the specified data value

201.description: Successfully created and associated a new data value

get.description:
Gets all available `DataValue` resources.
Optional query parameter of **start** and **size** enable pagination of the collection of data value resources, param **createdBy** filters result list by the creator and param **status** filters result list by status of the data values.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of data values to return

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: Name of the data element to which instance a data value belongs

200.description: Returns all `DataValue` resources based on the provided parameters.

post.summary: Creates and adds a new data value to the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: dataValueData
parameters.description: The name, type and who created the data value are required. The specification of a contentType is only required if the data type is binary.

201.description: Successfully created and added a new data value

get.summary: Find a data value by Id

parameters.name: dataValueId
parameters.description: Id of the data value that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `DataValue` resource based on the provided parameters.

parameters.name: dataValueId
parameters.description: Id of the data value that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataValue
parameters.description: The updated data value resource. Only changes to the following fields are reflected **name**, **type** and **contentType**. All other changes are ignored since the corresponding fields of the resource are internally set by the server or are immutable.

200.description: Returns the updated `DataValue` resource based on the provided modifications.

delete.description: Deletes a data value and its associated data from the TraDE middleware. All references from data element instances are invalidated accordingly.

parameters.name: dataValueId
parameters.description: Id of the data value that needs to be fetched

get.summary: Pulls data from the data value identified by Id

parameters.name: dataValueId
parameters.description: Id of the data value that needs to be fetched

200.description: Data attached to data value

post.summary: Pushes data to the TraDE middleware by attaching it to the data value identified by Id

parameters.name: dataValueId
parameters.description: Id of the data value to attach data to

parameters.name: Content-Length
parameters.description: The size of the data passed as header

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to push.

204.description: Successfully pushed data to TraDE middleware.

get.summary: Provides a list of all data element instances that use/refer to the data value with the given id. Optional query parameter of **start** and **size** enable pagination of the collection of data element instance resources.

parameters.name: dataValueId
parameters.description: Id of the data value that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns an array of `DataElementInstance` resource for the given data value.

get.description:
Gets all available `Notification` resources.
Optional query parameter of **start** and **size** enable pagination of the collection of notification resources, param **name** filters result list by the name and param **notifierServiceId** filters result list by the associated notifier service of the notification.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of notifications to return

parameters.name: notifierServiceId
parameters.description: The id of the notifier service used by a notification

200.description: Returns all `Notification` resources based on the provided parameters.

post.summary: Creates and adds a new notification to the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: notificationData
parameters.description: A name, notifier service id and an array of corresponding notifier parameter values are required. Furthermore, the id of the resource to observe, i.e., the resource for which this notification is registered or an array of resource filtes has to be provided. The resource filters allow to specify filter criteria which is evaluated in order to decide if a notification is triggered as a result of an event (e.g., state of a resource changed) or not.

201.description: Successfully created and added a new notification

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: Id of the notification that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `Notification` resource based on the provided parameters.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: Id of the notification that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: notification
parameters.description: The updated notification resource. Changes to the fields **id** and **href** are ignored since the corresponding fields of the resource are internally set by the server.

200.description: Returns the updated `Notification` resource based on the provided modifications.

delete.description: Deletes a notification from the TraDE middleware.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: Id of the notification that needs to be fetched

get.summary: Get the associated notifier service of this notification

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: Id of the notification for which the notifier service should to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `NotifierService` resource based on the provided parameters.

get.description:
Gets all available `NotifierService` resources.
Optional query parameter of **start** and **size** enable pagination of the collection of notifier service resources.

200.description: Returns all `NotifierService` resources based on the provided parameters.

get.summary: Find a notifier service by Id

parameters.name: notifierServiceId
parameters.description: Id of the notifier service that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `NotifierService` resource based on the provided parameters.

get.description:
Gets all available `resourceEventFilter` resources.
Optional query parameter of **start** and **size** enable pagination of the collection of resource event filter resources, param **eventType** filters result list by the event types of even filter descriptions.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: Event type of resource event filter descriptions to return

200.description: Returns all `ResourceEventFilter` resources based on the provided parameters.

get.summary: Find a resource event filter description by Id
get.description:
Provides one or more available `resourceEventFilter` descriptions based on the provided parameters.
Optional query parameter of **eventType** filters result list by the event types of even filter descriptions.

parameters.name: resourceEventFilterId
parameters.description: Id of the resource event filter that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: Event type of resource event filter descriptions to return

200.description: Returns a `ResourceEventFilter` resource based on the provided parameters.

LinkArray.description: An array of links which enable navigation, e.g., to support pagination of collection resources

startParam.name: start
startParam.description: Start index of returned collection of resources for pagination.

sizeParam.name: size
sizeParam.description: Size of the returned sub-collection of resources for pagination.

NotFoundResponse.description: The required resource was not found based on the provided query parameters.
